description: A pun involving frogs and ribbiting
title: Ribbiting Facts
n_1: A person is reading a book about frogs.
n_2: The person continues reading while the frog looks on.
c1_2: Did you know frogs can jump 20 times their body length?
n_3: The frog seems to be listening attentively.
c1_3: Frogs were the first land animals with vocal cords.
n_4: Both share a moment of enjoyment.
